alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL ST. JOHNS COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Saint Augustine, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts near 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Saint Augustine Beach, Vilano Beach, Saint Augustine South, Saint Augustine Shores, and Anastasia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
